description.narrative: The development objective of the project is to establish that federal departments and agencies in Mexico provide decision makers and the public with rigorous, timely, user-friendly information on the efficiency and effectiveness of government organizations and program expenditures.

title.narrative: Percent of programs with improved strategic design and reporting

comment.narrative: In 2008 the percentage of publicprograms using performance information was 28%. A sample analysis of 70 programs done in Oct 2007for SHCP (data from CONEVAL corroborates these findings) showed the majority present design problems (objectives, indicators, linkto strategies).

target.value: The majority of the programs have a more robust design across key dimensions (objectives, indicators, baselines, links tostrategies) enabling better reporting and evaluation.

comment.narrative: The majority of the programs have a more robust design across key dimensions (objectives, indicators, baselines, links tostrategies) enabling better reporting and evaluation.
Based oninformation from the third semester of 2013, the total number of public programs is 984, of which 832 use performanceinformation (84.55 per cent).

title.narrative: Percent of municipalities that have a simplified financial management system installed and working

comment.narrative: Around 80% ofapproximately 1,200 small municipalities (of totalapproximately 2,500 municipalities).

This indicator will no longer be in use. The Government is focusing its efforts in developing the Government Accounting System(Sistema de Contabilidad General, SCG) and will not continue to support municipalities on the use of the FMIS until the SCG hasbeen fully developed.

title.narrative: C3: Number of municipalities that have been trained inthe use of the new municipal simplified FMIS.

comment.narrative: This indicator will no longer be in use. The Government is focusing its efforts in developing the Government Accounting System(Sistema de Contabilidad General, SCG) and will not continue to support municipalities on the use of the FMIS until the SCG hasbeen fully developed.

title.narrative: An active network and a portal to inform civil society at large on a regular basis about budget performance increasing transparencyand accountability to citizens

baseline.value: Budget performance information isreadily available to civil society via the new portal but has not beenexpanded to all levelsofGovernment.

target.value: Portal containingPI on budget performance is available for citizens.

actual.value: Portal containingPI on budget performance is available for citizens.

comment.narrative: There is a SHCP Budget Transparency portal since 2011. The portal includes information on budget programs performance that isclearand easily accessible for citizens. Under the current National Development Plan, there is a Program for a Close and ModernGovernment which focuses on citizen transparency and accountability. Additionally, SHCP has recently produced differentpublications on Citizen Budget and Citizen Public Accounts.

title.narrative: C5: Design and dissemination of an evaluation for the SED

target.value: SED evaluation carried out anddisseminated through the portal

comment.narrative: Indicator no longer valid due to the delay in the execution of the planned evaluation. It is expected that under the newAdministration the SED will be deeply modified based on the guidelines set forth by the new National Development Plan, the Programfor a Close and Modern Government, and the Austerity Decree. Therefore, the implementing agency has decided to delay the evaluationat least one year.

title.narrative: C4: Design and dissemination of a number of strategic evaluations (e.g. security policy, water policy, education)

target.value: Strategic social and non socialevaluations carried out and disseminated through the portal.

comment.narrative: Due to changes in the Public Administration Law, the security policy strategic evaluation is no longer feasible (security policyisnow under Governing Secretary). The evaluation of education policy was also dropped based on the shift in priorities thatresulted from the change in the Administration in 2013. Finally, resources for the water policy have been transfered to a differentproject.

title.narrative: C4: Design of terms of reference for non social program evaluations

target.value: Terms of reference for non social program evaluations available.

actual.value: Terms of reference for non social program evaluations available.

comment.narrative: TOR have been prepared and the hiring process is underway.

title.narrative: C4: Public programs portfolio review to identify program delays and development of methodology for ex ante screening

target.value: Public programs portfolio reviewto carried out and methodology for ex ante screening available.

comment.narrative: The hiring process for the responsible firm is underway.

title.narrative: C4: Development of methodology and guidelines for better social program focalization

target.value: Methodology and guidelines for better social program focalization available.

comment.narrative: The hiring process of the firm was suspended because only two candidates presented proposals and the norm is that there should be aminimum of three.

title.narrative: C3: Strengthening the financial management (FM) system.

target.value: SIDAFF has a module designedfor integrating all three levels ofGovernment.

comment.narrative: The Government is currently working to strengthen FM systems through the development the Government Accounting System (Sistema deContabilidad General). In terms of the integration of the financial information, the Government plans to keep working towards thisgoal in 2014.

title.narrative: Performance information (PI) presented in budget requests from line secretariats to SHCP and in budget submitted to Congress

baseline.value: Performance information is not widely used by line secretariats in their budget requests. PI is sent to Congress on tightdeadlinesand in format/content that makes it non-usuable.

target.value: PI presented in a timely fashion to Congress in a format that allows interpretation and meets their needs. Content includesoutcome& output measures. Secretariats send budget requests to SHCP with PI.

comment.narrative: Information on performance is provided through different tools, including: i) Economic Situation, Finances and Public DebtReports,which are submitted every three months to the Chamber of Representatives; ii) Preamble of the Expenditures Budget Decree;and iii)the Performance Information Model (Model Sintetico de Informacion), which is submitted trimonthly to responsible units forBudget Programs.
